member.name: T:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.LongTextColumn
member.summary: Represents a column in a data grid that adjusts its row height based on the content length.
member.remarks: The class is designed to work with data grids where the row height needs to be dynamically adjusted to fit the content of cells containing long text. It listens to the to determine the appropriate height for each row based on the text content and the expansion state of the text.

member.remarks: This method calculates the required height for a row by evaluating its text height

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar
member.summary: Navigation bar for navigating through records in a . It provides commands to navigate to the first, previous, next, and last records. It also displays the current record number and the total number of records in the grid. It should be placed under the .
RecordNavigationBar

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: This constructor sets up the navigation commands for moving between records. It initializes the component and assigns commands for navigating to the next, last, previous, and first items.

member.summary: Dependency property for the associated with this navigation bar.

member.summary: Updates the binding of the to reflect the current item count of the specified data grid.
member.remarks: This method sets a binding on the to the item count of the provided data grid's data source. Ensure that the is not before calling this method.
member.param: The whose item count is used to update the binding. Cannot be .

member.summary: Gets or sets the instance associated with this component.

member.summary: Dependency property for the number of rows in the .

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of rows in the collection.

member.summary: Dependency property for property.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.UpdateDivider
member.summary: Integer value which determines how often is updated when loading large datasets. Only every Nth change in the collection will update the property.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.NextItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the next item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.NextItemExecute
member.summary: Selects the next item in the data grid, if available.
member.remarks: This method increments the selected index of the data grid by one, provided that the data grid is not null and the current selection is not the last item. If the selection is successfully updated, the new item is scrolled into view.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.LastItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the last item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.LastItemExecute
member.summary: Selects the last item in the data grid and scrolls it into view.
member.remarks: This method sets the selected index of the data grid to the last item and ensures it is visible by scrolling it into view. If the data grid is not initialized, the method exits without making changes.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.PreviousItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the previous item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.PreviousItemExecute
member.summary: Selects the previous item in the data grid, if possible.
member.remarks: This method decreases the selected index of the data grid by one, if the current selection is not already at the first item. If the data grid is null or the first item is selected, the method does nothing.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.FirstItemCommand
member.summary: Command to navigate to the first item in the .

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.FirstItemExecute
member.summary: Selects and executes the first item in the data grid.
member.remarks: This method sets the selected index of the data grid to the first item and ensures it is scrolled into view. If the data grid is not initialized, the method exits without performing any action.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RecordNavigationBar.ScrollInView(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method scrolls the specified row into view in the .

member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes.
member.remarks: This event is typically used to notify clients, such as user interfaces, that a property value has changed.

member.param: The name of the property that changed. This value is optional and can be automatically supplied by the compiler.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridTools
member.summary: Provides utility methods for handling mouse interactions with the header and row header cells in a .
member.remarks: This class contains methods that manage the selection behavior of columns and rows when interacting with the grid's header cells. It supports features such as toggling column selection and clearing or setting selections based on user input.
member.summary: SfDataGridTools

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridTools.GridHeaderCellControl_MouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse left button down event on a . This method toggles the IsSelected state of the column when the header cell is clicked. It also manages the selection of multiple columns based on the Shift and Control keys pressed during the click event.
member.remarks: If the column enables filtering or sorting, then selection is possible only if the mouse click position omits filter icon or sorting icon on the right of the header control. This condition allows the method to be handled on th PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown event of the header cell control, ensuring that the sorting functionality is not triggered when the user intends to select the column instead.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridTools.GridRowHeaderIndentCell_MouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the left mouse button down event on a grid row header indent cell to toggle the selection of the whole grid.
member.remarks: This method toggles the selection state of the grid's columns. If any cells are currently selected, it clears the selection. Otherwise, it selects or deselects all columns based on their current state.
member.param: The source of the event, expected to be a .
The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridTools.GridHeaderCellControl_MouseRightButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse right button down event on a . This method executes if the dataGrid allows column management and the control does not have a context menu and the command can be executed.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridTools.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowHeightProvider
member.summary: Provides functionality to determine the height of rows in a data grid.
member.remarks: This class contains methods that interact with data grid events to set row heights based on the data context.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowHeightProvider.OnQueryRowHeight(System.Object,Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.QueryRowHeightEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the query for row height in a data grid, setting the height based on the data context.
member.remarks: This method checks if the data context for the specified row index implements . If so, and the row height is not set to , it assigns the row height from the data context to the event arguments and marks the event as handled.
member.param: The source of the event, typically an instance of .
The containing event data, including the row index and a property to set the row height.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer
member.summary: This control allows resizing of rows in a . It is typically used at the bottom of the row header of a grid to adjust the height of rows.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a RowResizer.

member.name: F:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.MinRowHeightProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for the property. Default value is 24.0

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.MinRowHeight
member.summary: Minimum height of the Row being resized.

member.name: F:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.MaxRowHeightProperty
member.summary: DependencyProperty for the property. Default value is 120.0

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.MaxRowHeight
member.summary: Maximum height of the Row being resized.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.OnMouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse left button down event on the to start resizing the row height. Resizer is typically used at the bottom of the row header cell in a . This method checks if the data grid allows row resizing and if the click is near the bottom edge of the row header cell. If so, it sets the state of the grid to indicate that row resizing is in progress. Resizing a specific row requires the interface to be implemented by the data context of the row header cell.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.OnMouseMove(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse move event on the to resize the row height.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.RowResizer.OnMouseLeftButtonUp(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse left button up event on the to stop resizing the row height.

member.summary: A behavior class for managing the selection state of a in a Syncfusion DataGrid.

member.summary: Gets whether the column is selected.

member.summary: Sets the selection state of the column.

member.summary: Attached dependency property that indicates whether the column is selected.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnBehavior.OnIsSelectedChanged(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles changes to the IsSelected property of a GridColumn.
member.remarks: This method updates the styles of the GridColumn based on its selection state. If the column is selected, it applies the "SelectedColumnHeaderStyle" and "SelectedGridStyle" resources. If not selected, it resets the header style to its default and applies the "UnselectedGridStyle" to the cell style.
member.param: The dependency object that represents the GridColumn whose IsSelected property has changed.
The event data that contains information about the property change, including the new value.

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnConverter
member.summary: Provides a mechanism to get a object to specific property values for data binding in a .
member.remarks: This converter is used to extract specific properties from instances, such as the selection state.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridColumnConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a object to a specified property value based on the provided parameter.
member.param: The object to convert, expected to be of type .
The type to which the value is being converted. This parameter is not used in the conversion process.
A string specifying the property name to retrieve from the . Must be "IsSelected".
The culture to use in the converter. This parameter is not used in the conversion process.
member.returns: The value of the specified property from the . For "IsSelected", returns the selection state.
member.exception: Thrown if is not a string or if the property name is not recognized.
Thrown if is not of type .

member.name: T:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder
member.summary: Class containing tools for finding values and text in Syncfusion DataGrid columns.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.DataGrid
member.summary: DataGrid instance to operate on.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.Column
member.summary: Gets or sets the column to search.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.StrongTyped
member.summary: Specifies whether the specified value is strongly typed or string typed.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.SpecifiedValue
member.summary: Specified value to search for. It can be a string or any other type, depending on the FilterBehavior of the predicate.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.Replace
member.summary: Determines whether to replace the found value with the specified value.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.ReplacementValue
member.summary: Specified text to replace specified text (in StringTyped mode only).

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.Predicate
member.summary: Predicate defining the conditions of comparison.

member.name: P:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.Found
member.summary: Defines whether the specified value was found in the column.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.FindFirst
member.summary: Finds the first occurrence of a specified text in the column and selects the corresponding cell.
member.returns: True if first cells is found.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.FindNext
member.summary: Finds the next occurrence of a specified value in the column and selects the corresponding cell.
member.returns: True if next cells is found.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.FindAll
member.summary: Finds all occurrences of a specified value in the column and selects the corresponding cells.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.EvaluatePredicate(System.Object,System.Object,Syncfusion.Data.FilterPredicate)
member.summary: Evaluates the specified predicate against the current value and specified value.
member.param: Value found in the cell
Specified value to compare to
Conditions of comparison. If predicate FilterBehavior is StringTyped, then all values of FilterType are evaluated. For StronglyTyped behavior only Equals and NotEquals functions are evaluated.
member.returns: True if the current value compared against specified value satisfies the conditions of the predicate.

member.name: M:Qhta.SF.WPF.Tools.SfDataGridFinder.EvaluateReplacement(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,Syncfusion.Data.FilterPredicate)
member.summary: Replaces the specified text in the current value with the replacement text based on the predicate.
member.param: Value found in the cell
Specified value to compare to
Conditions of comparison. If predicate FilterBehavior is StringTyped, then all values of FilterType are evaluated. For StronglyTyped behavior only Equals and NotEquals functions are evaluated.
Value to replace specified value
member.returns: True if the current value compared against specified value satisfies the conditions of the predicate.
